name: Nancy SHAFFER, individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of Paul Vincent Shaffer, Appellant, v. LABORERS' DISTRICT COUNCIL OF WESTERN PENNSYLVANIA WELFARE FUND
name_abbreviation: Shaffer v. Laborers' District Council of Western Pennsylvania Welfare Fund

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala, papadakos and stout, JJ.
parties: Nancy SHAFFER, individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of Paul Vincent Shaffer, Appellant, v. LABORERS’ DISTRICT COUNCIL OF WESTERN PENNSYLVANIA WELFARE FUND.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Louis M. Tarasí, Jr., Susan D. Labriola, Joseph J. Hinchliffe, Tarasi, Tierney & Johnson, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Jeffrey J. Leech, Tucker Arensburg, P.C., Richard B. Tucker, III, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
538 A.2d 872
Nancy SHAFFER, individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of Paul Vincent Shaffer, Appellant, v. LABORERS’ DISTRICT COUNCIL OF WESTERN PENNSYLVANIA WELFARE FUND.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 8, 1988.
Decided March 21, 1988.
Louis M. Tarasí, Jr., Susan D. Labriola, Joseph J. Hinchliffe, Tarasi, Tierney & Johnson, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Jeffrey J. Leech, Tucker Arensburg, P.C., Richard B. Tucker, III, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala, papadakos and stout, JJ.
